content.html: If you’re paying attention to ReactEurasia’s choice for conference location, you’re witnessing why committees with diversity are important. It would’ve taken just a _single_ voice to express how poor & harmful that choice was for the community they’re serving.
content.value:
If you’re paying attention to ReactEurasia’s choice for conference location, you’re witnessing why committees with diversity are important.

It would’ve taken just a _single_ voice to express how poor & harmful that choice was for the community they’re serving.
